wikipedia_page.main: Lawrence "Laurie"/"Lawrie" William Thacker (19 or 20 March 1909 – 2 March 1952) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s. He played at representative level for England, British Empire and Yorkshire, and at club level for Hull FC, as a prop, i.e. number 8 or 10, during the era of contested scrums.
